title: Swain Update
body:
So I read the update and looked at the new skillset.

Why?

This is a repeat of the Galio update, changing a champion so much that you may as well have made it a new champ, not a replacement. Even Warwick seems like a completely different champ.

Again, why?

As an ARAM only player, I don't have a "main" (unless random counts as a main), but Swain is my highest mastery champ, and I always try and trade for him, giving up great ARAM champs like {{champion:99}} {{champion:115}} etc, for the chance to do 'Swain things'.

It seems like Rito is taking these champs with a unique identity and play style, and just mainstreaming them to be more like every other champ, which is fucking boring.

I'm not pre-judging how good (or bad) new Swain will be, I just don't see why it isn't a new champ rather than a replacement.

Thoughts?
